post:
Hi there,

Xsltel OÜ is a one-man show registered in Estonia and been in business since 2011. managing and automating everything from home.
I use “we”, “us” and “our” on this website, emails, and communication channels to represent myself and my services obviously because it seems more professional to do that.

So recently Leaseweb had some great offers on the latest Xeon-E series and I decided to put up some [cheap yearly cPanel shared web hosting](https://www.xsl.tel/hosting/shared-web-hosting/cheap-cpanel-shared-web-hosting "cheap yearly cPanel shared web hosting").

Starter Plan
8GB SSD
80GB Multi-homed bandwidth
Unlimited domains & everything else
The Netherlands \ Amsterdam \ Leaseweb
Price is ~~15~~ 12.95/year (With coupon below)
[Register here](https://my.xsl.tel/register.php "Register here")
then
Verify your email
then
[Verify your phone & Order here](https://my.xsl.tel/cart.php?a=add&pid=31&promocode=W05M7TFKYU "Order here") (Coupon applied on the summary page)

More info about this offer and our other plans can be located on our [cheap cPanel shared web hosting](https://www.xsl.tel/hosting/shared-web-hosting/cheap-cpanel-shared-web-hosting "cheap cPanel shared web hosting") page.

Don't want to spend money? fine check our [free cPanel shared web hosting](https://www.xsl.tel/hosting/shared-web-hosting/free-cpanel-shared-web-hosting "free cPanel shared web hosting") (Idlers are not welcome on our free plan ;)).

Best regards,
Mohammed H
